name: 2048-angular
body:
### My interpretation of famous 2048 game in AngularJS framework.
This game is based on online tutorial, that was published originally on [ng newsletter](http://www.ng-newsletter.com/).

### Build with current Front-end technology.
To make thist game work i used several technology e.g.- [Yeoman](http://yeoman.io/), [Grunt](http://gruntjs.com/), [Karma](http://karma-runner.github.io/0.13/index.html) and [SASS](http://sass-lang.com/).

### Simple Backend with Parse
I store data about current high scores inside [Parse](http://parse.com/) cloud, so i don't need my own server with database to do this.

### How to install 2048-angular game ?
To check how this game work in real, you need to download repository.
Then open your command line, move to repository location and hit:

* npm install 
* bower install
* grunt serve
